name: lost control - zombie edition
description:
Your diver is out, and you've lost all control of your vehicle, your only chances to survive now are to grab hold of our rocket launcher, kill some zombies, and pray to God that you don't come to a rock, because hitting one of those is completely out of your control. 

To play this game, just click where you wish to shoot (That's it)

P.S. Full Screen will give you an advantage (but might not look the best)

(Leader Board isn't working as of right now so this will have so suffice "Good job, I'm not sure what score you got, but at least you tried :D")
